resources.string: Tic Tac Toe is the game played by two players and this is played by putting O or X from available spaces. (1) It is the game with 3 * 3 empty grid. (2) First Player chooses his places and put "O" in his desired place next comes the next player and chooses the desired spot and try to create the pattern of three common Symbols in horizontal or vertical or in diagonal manner (3) The one who creates three constant marks first wins Game.
